items.question: What image quality can I expect after reshaping?
items.answer: Expect high-resolution images with refined details and realistic proportions. Our models ensure that reshaped images maintain clarity and sophistication suitable for any context.

items.question: Can I specify specific body modifications?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can provide detailed prompts on how you want the body shape altered, from resizing to enhancing muscle definition.

items.question: What image types work best for reshaping?
items.answer: Clear, high-resolution images yield the best results. We recommend images with good lighting and contrast for optimal changes.

items.question: How is this different from traditional photo editing?
items.answer: AI body reshaping allows for dynamic adjustments in real-time, offering a level of realism and sophistication not achievable with standard editing tools.

items.question: Can I enhance the quality after the image is reshaped?
items.answer: Yes! Utilize our enhancement tools post-reshaping to elevate resolution and quality further.

items.question: What pricing model is used for body reshaping?
items.answer: WaveSpeed follows a pay-per-use model with no hidden fees; you only pay for the reshapes you actually generate.

items.question: How quickly are images reshaped?
items.answer: Reshaping is typically done in minutes, allowing multiple images to be processed swiftly.

items.question: What are the best applications for body reshaping technology?
items.answer: This technology is perfect for fitness modeling, personal branding, e-commerce, and social media content.

items.question: Do I retain rights to the reshaped images?
items.answer: Yes! You retain full commercial rights to all reshaped images, without additional fees.

items.question: What support is available for troubleshooting?
items.answer: We provide extensive resources, including documentation and customer support, to assist with any questions or technical issues.
